column4: I'm putting 8.10 back on immediately and will carve out a small space for 9.04. I'll check back in every now and then to see if any updates fix my issues. Otherwise, I'll pray 9.10 fixes it.

Firefox performance sucks for lack of a better word. Urban Terror (my favorite FPS) plays like crap. Sound on my laptop doesn't work on boot--I have to kill Pulse Audio to make it work. The Display app doesn't work on my desktop well at all. That's all I've discovered in 24 hours.
